name: OTK Database Maintenance - token revocation list

policy.xml:

    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">

        </L7p:CommentAssertion>

            <L7p:Comment stringValue=" ============================================"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:Encapsulated>
            <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigGuid stringValue="9bc491e9-4c21-462b-bb6c-41b88f677d26"/>
